column4: Tell me, experts, is migrating to utf-8 a big project under gutsy?
utf8 is the default under gutsy
Really? I have some files created under edgy with scand-characters in them. They do look funny with ls and under vdr (Video Disk Recorder). how do I change these names into a readable format?
khermans is saying us has problems (news to me) You using us?
